title: So the new client wont let me update nor use the old client...
body: It just opens the new update window and it doesn't even show the estimated time let alone any information other than an empty bar and the league of legends logo. Any idea?

replies.body: It sounds like a security setting on your PC may have changed, so it may be blocking your game files from scanning or even launching the patcher on the legacy client.  Start off with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is being allowed.  Let me know how things go from there.

I just had to uninstall, and reinstall both the legacy and alpha client, and so far the patch is downloading. I'll let you know if anything else changes. It seems that this fixed it. Let me know if it does the same.
